channel.title: Lycos =(
channel.description:
hey,
Does anyone has some experience with lycos? (The webhost). I'm already waiting two weeks for my domain now.. it's there, but my account isn't activated yet so i can't change the DNS settings :(
Does it always take that long? The page i'm always looking at says:
Welcome, you're domain name is being made. This will take one or two days.
argh :P

item.title: Lycos =(
item.dc:creator: @mr_candy mr candy
item.description:
@mr_candy wrote:

sigh use 123-reg you get to access everything to ur domain as soon as you buy it when you change dns it takes 1-2 days max look i brought this today www.lowdex.com uber leetness

Read full topic

item.title: Lycos =(
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

Something similar happened to me. I bought the domain but they never gave me it or activated my account lol. So I went with Tripod to get a free one or whatever and it said something about how I had a domain with lycos or something. So I sent them a message asking where my money went and they said they never got any money. Fucking bastards.

Read full topic
